21 #include "infft.h"
22 
27 void Y(assertion_failed)(const char *s, int line, const char *file)
28 {
29  fflush(stdout);
30  fprintf(stderr, "nfft: %s:%d: assertion failed: %s\n", file, line, s);
31 #ifdef HAVE_ABORT
32  /* Use abort function. */
33  abort();
34 #else
35  /* Use exit function. */
36  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
37 #endif
38 }
